nodes.id: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部

location.zh-cn: 北京市东城区和平里北街21号
location.en: No. 21, Hepingli North Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院已撤销的部门，负责管理中国的煤炭工业。
description.en: A former ministry of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing China's coal industry.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国燃料工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国燃料工业部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国已撤销的部门，是煤炭工业部的前身机构之一。
description.en: A former ministry of the People's Republic of China, one of the predecessors of the Ministry of Coal Industry.

nodes.id: 第一届全国人民代表大会第二次会议

zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会第二次会议

description.zh-cn: 1955年7月召开的会议，会议决定对国务院所属机构进行调整。
description.en: A meeting held in July 1955 which decided to adjust the subordinate bodies of the State Council.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国燃料化学工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国燃料化学工业部

description.zh-cn: 由煤炭工业部、石油工业部和化学工业部于1970年合并成立的国务院组成部门，1975年被撤销。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council formed in 1970 by the merger of the Ministry of Coal Industry, Ministry of Petroleum Industry, and Ministry of Chemical Industry, which was abolished in 1975.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国能源部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国能源部

description.zh-cn: 于1988年由煤炭、石油、核工业部等部门的政府职能合并而成，1993年被撤销。
description.en: Formed in 1988 by merging the governmental functions of ministries including coal, petroleum, and nuclear industries, and was abolished in 1993.

nodes.id: 第八届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第八届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 1993年3月召开的会议，会议决定撤销能源部，再次组建煤炭工业部。
description.en: A meeting held in March 1993 which decided to abolish the Ministry of Energy and re-establish the Ministry of Coal Industry.

nodes.id: 第九届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第九届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 1998年3月召开的会议，批准了国务院机构改革方案，决定不再保留煤炭工业部。
description.en: A meeting held in March 1998 which approved the State Council's institutional reform plan, deciding not to retain the Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 原国家经贸委下设的主管煤炭行业的机构，接替了原煤炭工业部的部分职能。
description.en: An agency under the former State Economic and Trade Commission responsible for the coal industry, which took over some functions of the former Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华人民共和国煤炭工业部首任部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, the first Minister of the Ministry of Coal Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国煤炭工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of the Ministry of Coal Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾作为军代表负责煤炭工业部工作。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as a military representative in charge of the Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国煤炭工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of the Ministry of Coal Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国煤炭工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of the Ministry of Coal Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国煤炭工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of the Ministry of Coal Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国煤炭工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of the Ministry of Coal Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国煤炭工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of the Ministry of Coal Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1960年5月9日发生的中华人民共和国最大矿难。
description.en: The largest mine disaster in the People's Republic of China, which occurred on May 9, 1960.

description.zh-cn: 1961年由中共中央书记处宣布成立，负责组织经济部门和工交战线落实中央八届九中全会确定的方针和措施，以解决经济困难，特别是煤炭生产供应问题。
description.en: Announced by the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee in 1961, this group was responsible for organizing economic departments and the industrial/transportation front to implement the policies and measures set by the 9th Plenary Session of the 8th CPC Central Committee, aiming to solve economic difficulties, especially in coal production and supply.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央机构之一，是中央政治局和它的常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: One of the central bodies of the Communist Party of China, serving as the administrative body for the Politburo and its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家经委主任，为十人小组负责人。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the State Economic Commission, and head of the 'Group of Ten'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家经委常务主任，为十人小组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Executive Deputy Director of the State Economic Commission, and a member of the 'Group of Ten'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任冶金工业部长，为十人小组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Metallurgical Industry, and a member of the 'Group of Ten'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任铁道部长，为十人小组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Railways, and a member of the 'Group of Ten'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国防工业委员会副主任，为十人小组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Deputy Director of the National Defense Industry Committee, and a member of the 'Group of Ten'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任水利电力部长，为十人小组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power, and a member of the 'Group of Ten'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任化学工业部长，为十人小组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Chemical Industry, and a member of the 'Group of Ten'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任农业机械部长，为十人小组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Agricultural Machinery, and a member of the 'Group of Ten'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第三机械工业部长，为十人小组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of the Third Ministry of Machine Building, and a member of the 'Group of Ten'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国在1960年代中期发起的一场以战备为指导思想的大规模国防、科技和工业建设。
description.en: A large-scale national defense, technology, and industrial development campaign in China's interior, launched in the mid-1960s with a focus on war preparedness.

description.zh-cn: 中国贵州省下辖的地级市，是“三线建设”时期建设的重要煤炭基地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Guizhou province, China, an important coal base built during the 'Third Front' construction period.

description.zh-cn: 中国四川省攀枝花市的旧称，是“三线建设”时期建设的重要煤炭基地。
description.en: The former name of Panzhihua City in Sichuan province, China, an important coal base built during the 'Third Front' construction period.

description.zh-cn: 中国工业战线上的一场学习运动，号召全国企业学习大庆油田和开滦煤矿的经验。
description.en: A campaign on China's industrial front, calling for enterprises nationwide to learn from the experiences of the Daqing Oil Field and the Kailuan Coal Mine.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史悠久的大型煤炭企业，是“学大庆，赶开滦”运动中的榜样之一。
description.en: A large, long-established coal enterprise in China, one of the models in the 'Learn from Daqing, Catch up with Kailuan' movement.

nodes.id: 全国煤矿采掘队长会议

zh-cn: 全国煤矿采掘队长会议

description.zh-cn: 1975年10月30日召开的全国性会议，旨在表彰先进，推动煤炭生产。
description.en: A national conference held on October 30, 1975, aimed at commending advanced units and promoting coal production.

nodes.id: 东北内蒙古煤炭工业联合公司

zh-cn: 东北内蒙古煤炭工业联合公司

description.zh-cn: 曾统一管理东北三省和内蒙古东部地区统配煤矿的联合企业。
description.en: A joint enterprise that once centrally managed the state-allocated coal mines in the three northeastern provinces and the eastern part of Inner Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 曾负责管理全国统配煤矿的国有企业，1993年被撤销。
description.en: A state-owned enterprise formerly responsible for managing the nation's state-allocated coal mines, which was abolished in 1993.

nodes.id: 国务院关于撤销中国东北内蒙古煤炭集团暨中国东北内蒙古煤炭集团公司的通知

zh-cn: 国务院关于撤销中国东北内蒙古煤炭集团暨中国东北内蒙古煤炭集团公司的通知

description.zh-cn: 国务院于1994年3月1日发布的通知，决定撤销东北内蒙古煤炭工业联合公司。
description.en: A notice issued by the State Council on March 1, 1994, deciding to abolish the Northeast Inner Mongolia Coal Industry Joint Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所著名高等学府，原为煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: A well-known institution of higher education in China, formerly a public institution directly under the Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等学府，其前身阜新矿业学院为原煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, its predecessor, Fuxin Mining Institute, was a public institution directly under the former Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等学府，其前身山东矿业学院为原煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, its predecessor, Shandong Mining Institute, was a public institution directly under the former Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等学府，其前身西安矿业学院为原煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, its predecessor, Xi'an Mining Institute, was a public institution directly under the former Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等学府，其前身焦作矿业学院为原煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, its predecessor, Jiaozuo Mining Institute, was a public institution directly under the former Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等学府，原为煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, formerly a public institution directly under the Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等学府，其前身淮南矿业学院为原煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, its predecessor, Huainan Mining Institute, was a public institution directly under the former Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等学府，原为煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, formerly a public institution directly under the Ministry of Coal Industry.

zh-cn: 河北煤炭建筑工程学院

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等学府，其前身河北煤炭建筑工程学院为原煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, its predecessor, Hebei Institute of Coal Civil Engineering, was a public institution directly under the former Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等学府，其前身中国煤炭经济学院为原煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, its predecessor, China Institute of Coal Economics, was a public institution directly under the former Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等学府，其前身湘潭矿业学院为原煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, its predecessor, Xiangtan Mining Institute, was a public institution directly under the former Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等学府，其前身黑龙江矿业学院为原煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, its predecessor, Heilongjiang Mining Institute, was a public institution directly under the former Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等学府，其前身淮北煤炭师范学院为原煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, its predecessor, Huaibei Coal Industry Teachers College, was a public institution directly under the former Ministry of Coal Industry.

nodes.id: 鸡西煤炭医学高等专科学校

zh-cn: 鸡西煤炭医学高等专科学校

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等专科学校，原为煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: A junior college in China, formerly a public institution directly under the Ministry of Coal Industry.

nodes.id: 北京工业职业技术学院

zh-cn: 北京工业职业技术学院

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等职业技术学院，原为煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: A vocational and technical college in China, formerly a public institution directly under the Ministry of Coal Industry.

nodes.id: 北京煤炭管理干部学院

zh-cn: 北京煤炭管理干部学院

description.zh-cn: 原为煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: Formerly a public institution directly under the Ministry of Coal Industry.

nodes.id: 北京煤炭管理干部学院分院

zh-cn: 北京煤炭管理干部学院分院

description.zh-cn: 原为煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: Formerly a public institution directly under the Ministry of Coal Industry.

description.zh-cn: 其前身煤炭总医院为原煤炭工业部直属事业单位。
description.en: Its predecessor, the General Coal Hospital, was a public institution directly under the former Ministry of Coal Industry.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门。
description.en: The Ministry of Coal Industry of the People's Republic of China was a constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会第二次会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国燃料工业部

description.zh-cn: 1955年7月，第一届全国人民代表大会第二次会议决定撤销燃料工业部。
description.en: In July 1955, the Second Session of the First National People's Congress decided to abolish the Ministry of Fuel Industry.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会第二次会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部

description.zh-cn: 1955年7月，第一届全国人民代表大会第二次会议决定设立煤炭工业部。
description.en: In July 1955, the Second Session of the First National People's Congress decided to establish the Ministry of Coal Industry.

relationships.source: 第八届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国能源部

description.zh-cn: 1993年3月，第八届全国人民代表大会第一次会议决定撤销能源部。
description.en: In March 1993, the First Session of the Eighth National People's Congress decided to abolish the Ministry of Energy.

relationships.source: 第八届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 中国统配煤矿总公司

description.zh-cn: 1993年3月，第八届全国人民代表大会第一次会议决定撤销中国统配煤矿总公司。
description.en: In March 1993, the First Session of the Eighth National People's Congress decided to abolish the China National Unified Distribution Coal Corporation.

relationships.source: 第八届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部

description.zh-cn: 1993年3月，第八届全国人民代表大会第一次会议决定再次组建煤炭工业部。
description.en: In March 1993, the First Session of the Eighth National People's Congress decided to re-establish the Ministry of Coal Industry.

relationships.source: 第九届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部

description.zh-cn: 1998年3月，第九届全国人大第一次会议批准国务院机构改革方案，决定不再保留中华人民共和国煤炭工业部。
description.en: In March 1998, the First Session of the Ninth National People's Congress approved the State Council's institutional reform plan and decided not to retain the Ministry of Coal Industry of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 第九届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 国家煤炭工业局

description.zh-cn: 1998年3月，第九届全国人大第一次会议决定，在国家经贸委下设主管煤炭行业的国家煤炭工业局。
description.en: In March 1998, the First Session of the Ninth National People's Congress decided to establish the State Administration of Coal Industry under the State Economic and Trade Commission to oversee the coal sector.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部

中华人民共和国煤炭工业部
中华人民共和国煤炭工业部
董必武

description.zh-cn: 老白洞矿难发生后，国家副主席董必武与煤炭工业部部长张霖之共同亲临现场视察指导。
description.en: After the Laobaidong mine disaster, Vice President Dong Biwu and Minister of Coal Industry Zhang Linzhi visited the site to inspect and guide the work.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央书记处
relationships.target: 十人小组

description.zh-cn: 1961年1月19日，中共中央书记处通知宣布成立中央“十人小组”，以解决经济困难，特别是煤炭生产供应问题。
description.en: On January 19, 1961, the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee announced the establishment of the central 'Group of Ten' to address economic difficulties, especially in coal production and supply.

十人小组
开滦矿务局

description.zh-cn: 1973年，周恩来总理表扬开滦煤矿工人为国家“出了力，救了急，立了功”。
description.en: In 1973, Premier Zhou Enlai praised the workers of the Kailuan Coal Mine for 'contributing, providing urgent help, and rendering meritorious service' to the country.

relationships.target: 六盘水市

description.zh-cn: “三线建设”时期，在西南地区进行了六盘水煤炭基地建设。
description.en: During the 'Third Front' construction period, the Liupanshui coal base was developed in the southwest region.

relationships.target: 渡口市

description.zh-cn: “三线建设”时期，在西南地区进行了渡口煤炭基地建设。
description.en: During the 'Third Front' construction period, the Dukou coal base was developed in the southwest region.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部

description.zh-cn: 全国煤炭工业系统开展“学大庆，赶开滦”运动。
description.en: The entire national coal industry system launched the 'Learn from Daqing, Catch up with Kailuan' movement.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部
relationships.target: 全国煤矿采掘队长会议

description.zh-cn: 1975年10月30日，煤炭工业部组织召开了全国煤矿采掘队长会议。
description.en: On October 30, 1975, the Ministry of Coal Industry organized and held the National Conference of Coal Mine Excavation Team Leaders.

relationships.source: 国务院关于撤销中国东北内蒙古煤炭集团暨中国东北内蒙古煤炭集团公司的通知
relationships.target: 东北内蒙古煤炭工业联合公司

description.zh-cn: 国务院于1994年3月1日发文，撤销了东北内蒙古煤炭工业联合公司。
description.en: The State Council issued a document on March 1, 1994, abolishing the Northeast Inner Mongolia Coal Industry Joint Corporation.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部

description.zh-cn: 中国矿业大学曾是煤炭工业部的直属事业单位。
description.en: China University of Mining and Technology was once a public institution directly under the Ministry of Coal Industry.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部

description.zh-cn: 辽宁工程技术大学（原阜新矿业学院）曾是煤炭工业部的直属事业单位。
description.en: Liaoning Technical University (formerly Fuxin Mining Institute) was once a public institution directly under the Ministry of Coal Industry.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部

description.zh-cn: 山东科技大学（原山东矿业学院）曾是煤炭工业部的直属事业单位。
